abstract: 'She believes that everyone should be treated the same, she also believes in world peace'.
description: If Laura O'Donnell could give out an award for Best Friend, her neighbour Bree would get it. The share a close bond, despite differences and going to seperate schools. O'Donnell celebrates their friendship.
